Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Westbound Reroute near Chicago/Austin
ShortDescription: WB 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago due to, street blockage near Chicago/Austin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 87th/Western
ShortDescription: EB 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Western, 83rd, Damen and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Western, 83rd, Damen and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Western.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
